cookieBanner.textPrefix: We use cookies to continuously improve our website. By clicking “Accept”, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our
cookieBanner.textSuffix: Alternatively, you can select your preferred settings by clicking “More options”.

modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.descriptionPrefix: You can select which cookies should be set when you use our website. For more information, please refer to our
modal.necessaryDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. Generally, they are only set in response to actions you take that are related to a service request, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling out forms. Necessary cookies do not store any personal information.
modal.performanceDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so that we can measure and improve the performance of our website. They help us to see how visitors use our services and features. All the information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not accept these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our website and will not be able to monitor its performance.

translations.info: Ready to translate? Choose your preferred method.

aiTranslationVerification.title: AI translation
aiTranslationVerification.description: Instant download, {0} files remain this month.

hero.title: We are rethinking translation
hero.description: Translate better, faster and more securely with fused translation.

lead.large: With AI, you can translate <highlight>hundreds of words in seconds</highlight>. But how do you make sure that <highlight>every single one is right</highlight>?
lead.small: This is why we combine language AI with experienced human translators, all in one place. For a seamless integration of artificial intelligence and human expertise – with you in the driver’s seat. At Supertext, AI efficiency meets professional expertise. Text security meets data security. Supertext is simple, customised and adaptive. Supertext is all-in-one.

featureList.title: Fused translation with Supertext: your advantages

benefits.title: Everything on a single platform
benefits.description: From fully automated to handcrafted: at Supertext, the decision is yours. We combine innovative translation AI with experienced human translators on a single platform. Seamless integration of artificial intelligence and real language professionals – with you in the driver’s seat.

benefits.title: Double the security
benefits.description: Data security and content security – with us, you have both. Guaranteed by our first-class data management standards and by our professional Verification service at the touch of a button. Everything you need for multilingual communication, without compromises.

benefits.title: Efficiency meets flexibility
benefits.description: Our language models learn quickly – and adapt to your needs with every verified translation. For ever-improving quality at ever-decreasing costs.

serviceList.title: Ensuring your message gets through: our solutions.

sections.title: AI translation in 23 languages
sections.description: Our online translator is based on our own latest-generation AI systems. These are proficient in 23 languages, including local variants such as French for Switzerland. Fast, easy and with the highest security standards.

sections.title: A professional check at the push of a button
sections.description: Play it safe. With just one click, we will connect you directly with an experienced language professional who will review your translation – and make any necessary improvements. Within minutes, you will receive your text back with all the necessary corrections.

sections.title: A personal AI model that learns in real time
sections.description: Our language models learn quickly – and adapt to your needs with every verified translation. For ever-improving quality at ever-decreasing costs.

sections.title: Customised AI translation
sections.description: Your company, your voice. Supertext integrates your style guidelines and wording into every translation through targeted training. For seamless communication without borders.

sections.title: Service solutions from Arabic to Zulu
sections.description: When only the best will do: our 3,000 experienced language experts write more beautifully and translate even more precisely than AI. In your tone of voice, expressively and accurately in every language.

sections.title: Personal support
sections.description: Would you like to adapt your AI model to a new style guide? Or do you want to evaluate your current workflows with the help of experts? We are here for you personally – solution-oriented, friendly and fast.

sections.title: Expanded security standards
sections.description: From single sign-on (SSO) to on-premises hosting – Supertext reliably keeps your business data secure.

sections.title: Seamlessly integrated
sections.description: Seamlessly integrate Supertext into your work environment with our APIs and integrations for streamlined processes in every interface.

caseList.title: From fully automated to handcrafted: we work for over 1,500 companies across Europe.

footerNote.text: From the simple <highlight>online translator</highlight> to <highlight>fully integrated custom solutions</highlight>: find your <highlight>perfect subscription.</highlight>

heroSection.mainHeading:
Fused translation:
we are rethinking translation

items.title: AI translation & Verification
items.description: Certainty – in minutes, not hours. With our professional check at the push of a button.

items.title: Specialised translation
items.description: By recognised specialists with experience in your field.

items.title: Copywriting & content
items.description: For texts that work – creative and on target.

items.title: Editing
items.description: The final touch – stylish, meticulous and fast.

items.title: Why Supertext?
AI technology
Language expertise

cards.title: Translate into 23 languages immediately
cards.description: Supertext helps you communicate faster, better and more securely. Our AI translation solution is based on our own latest-generation LLM systems and supports 23 languages, from Japanese to Swiss German. Simple, in line with the highest security standards and seamlessly integrated into any system.

cards.title: A professional check at the push of a button
cards.description: Certainty with a click: have important translations checked by the professionals – in minutes rather than hours. Supertext connects you directly with over 3,000 experienced linguists and cultural experts. So your message is sure to arrive safely when it really matters.

cards.title: A personal AI model that learns in real time
cards.description: Our language models learn quickly – and adapt to your style, word choice and needs with every professionally verified translation. For ever-improving quality at ever-decreasing costs.

cards.title: Specialist translations by experienced experts
cards.description: Our 3,000 hand-picked language experts are specialised in their fields and are standing by to provide impeccably accurate translations for everything from contract texts to poster campaigns, from InDesign files to Word documents and from Arabic to Zulu.

cards.title: Copywriting & content by creative professional writers
cards.description: Our global team of experienced copywriters steps in where words fail you. In your tone of voice, creatively and accurately, for everything from blog articles to international poster campaigns.

cards.title: Professional editing for the final touch
cards.description: Selected editors ensure that every i is dotted and t is crossed, and that every word is in the right place. We correct, edit and proofread according to your specifications. Fastidious and record-breakingly fast.

cards.title: Custom LLMs for even better language quality
cards.description: The best language model is your own one. That’s why we develop custom LLMs tailored to your specific style and content formats. For seamless communication across the entire company – unmistakable in every language.

cards.title: Data security to your exact specifications
cards.description: From private cloud or on-premises hosting to single sign-on (SSO): our business solution lets you flexibly design the security measures. That’s why we are the partner of choice for banks, government agencies and insurers.

cards.title: The all-in-one solution that just keeps getting better
cards.description: From fully automated to handcrafted: with Supertext, companies can get all their translations from a single source. For greater security, consistently better quality and ever-decreasing costs thanks to ongoing AI learning.

valueProposition.heading: To ensure your message comes across <highlight>correctly in every language</highlight>: our services

references.heading: 1,500 companies across Europe: our references speak for themselves

blog.heading: News, background and the latest features

footerNote.text: Supertext lets companies translate <highlight>better, faster, cheaper</highlight> and <highlight>more securely</highlight>. From 0% to 100% automated.

hero.title: Experienced professionals – in top form thanks to language AI
hero.description: Our language experts are there for you when every word counts.

lead.large: <highlight>Fully automatic</highlight> or <highlight>handcrafted?</highlight> The answer often lies somewhere in between.
lead.small: With AI, you can translate hundreds of words in seconds. And with our experts, you can be certain that every single one of them is correct. At Supertext, you can order the support of experienced specialists as an add-on with just a few clicks. Whenever you need both expertise in your field and genuine passion. <break/><break/> <break></break>The big advantage: your AI learns with every professional project and adapts to your style on an ongoing basis. For smooth communication to your exact specifications – and continuously decreasing costs.

benefits.title: 20+ AI experts, engineers and security professionals
benefits.description: Our tech team is doing pioneering work that pays off. We are developing reliable, secure and flexible language AI technology without compromise. It forms the basis for high language quality at scale, seamlessly integrated into every process and interface.

benefits.title: 3,000 selected professional translators, copywriters and editors
benefits.description: From Geneva to Milan, from Buenos Aires to Tokyo: Supertext works with specialised native linguists worldwide. They all have a translation degree or more than five years of experience and undergo rigorous testing.

benefits.title: In-house language specialists for consistency and quality assurance
benefits.description: Full-time specialists ensure in-house expertise and quality control in the core languages. They develop guidelines, put together subject-specific teams for individual clients and are the first point of contact for linguistic conundrums.

benefits.title: Personal support from experienced project managers
benefits.description: Our project managers are the flexible hub for large projects and your direct contact at Supertext. They ensure that your requirements are implemented precisely, that deadlines are met and that translated files are perfectly laid out in every format.

sections.title: AI translation with professional check
sections.description: Make sure everything’s perfect. With automatic translation – and a professional check at the push of a button.

sections.title: Specialised translation
sections.description: Technology meets experienced specialists. From InDesign to Word and from Arabic to Zulu.

sections.title: Copywriting & content
sections.description: We start where words fail you. In your tone of voice, creative and always on the mark.

sections.title: Editing
sections.description: The final touch for your text. Stylish, meticulous and fast.

sections.title: Plain language
sections.description: We make even specialist texts easy to understand. For greater trust and fewer support requests.

sections.title: Consultation
sections.description: Do you have big plans? We have the right solution in every language. From 0% to 100% automated.

portraits.subtitle: PROFILES
portraits.title: Expertise from Å to Ž: meet our team

items.quote: “Until every word is in its place.”

content.title: What are your tasks at Supertext?
content.text: Anything that has to do with language in any form. We verify AI translations and review freelancer work, but also develop workflows for clients with specific requirements, whether that involves quality checks, developing style guides or setting up and maintaining linguistic teams.

content.title: What makes a good language specialist?
content.text: In addition to a passion for languages, the most important thing is an interest in what technology has to offer. Tech helps us keep our skills sharp and ready for anything that our clients might request. We also need a keen eye for detail and the drive to get every project, no matter how tightly scheduled, across the finish line.

content.title: And how exactly do you ensure maximum language quality?
content.text: Firstly, by only working with people who have a degree in language or many years of experience. And secondly, by not leaving anything to chance and working tirelessly to ensure that every word is in the right place. This can sometimes be tricky, but it is always worth it.

items.quote: “The best language model? Your own one.”

content.title: What exactly does a research scientist do?
content.text: In short: I turn client requirements into reality by improving existing translation models and developing specialised models that we can tailor to the corporate wording of our clients through training. We also develop new features based on the latest research findings.

content.title: How does specialised training like this work – and what does it require?
content.text: We develop the model and adapt it to the company’s individual language and style. For training, we require raw material – usually internal translation data from clients – and broad knowledge of computer linguistics and coding. From the initial green light to the delivery, it takes about six weeks. In between, we carry out extensive testing and comparison with quality standards.

content.title: What is the coolest feature you have developed so far?
content.text: Our dialect feature – with it, you can translate from and to Swiss German, including various dialects such as Zurich German and Bernese German. The technology behind it was tricky, as there are relatively few texts available for training in these languages.

footerNote.text: Do you want to develop a <highlight>style guide</highlight> for your company? Or process 4,000 <highlight>translation projects</highlight> per month?

hero.title: Available in almost every language
hero.description: Whether it’s about projects, feedback, dream jobs or a demo: let’s talk.

hero.title: Working at Supertext
hero.description: How we are positioned. Where we want to go. And how you can be a part of it.

lead.large: We live and love <highlight>language</highlight> and <highlight>technology.</highlight> And we are always on the lookout for <highlight>new collaborators</highlight> who feel the same way.
lead.small: As an international AI language service provider, we deliver projects for over 1,500 companies across Europe. We drive change and develop solutions that redefine the status quo. With AI and human expertise at the core of our work. <break></break> <break></break> Behind our language technology solutions is a team of over 100 experts in AI research, software, linguistics and project management. Fast-thinking, fast-acting, and driven by constant knowledge exchange.

benefits.title: Language management
benefits.description: Our in-house experts in the core languages. They ensure quality control, are the first point of contact for linguistic challenges and actively work on improving our AI models.

benefits.title: Project management
benefits.description: The flexible hub for large projects and personal client care. They ensure that requirements are implemented precisely, deadlines are met and translated files are perfectly laid out in every format.

benefits.title: Technology
benefits.description: Our development team creates customised programming for our clients – from specialised AI solutions to additional language features to personal system connections. Flexible and implemented in record time thanks to in-house development.

benefits.title: Vendor management
benefits.description: The first point of contact for our external language professionals. They are responsible for recruiting and evaluating our freelancers and for answering any follow-up questions about the collaboration.

benefits.title: Sales & marketing
benefits.description: The two teams have a common goal: to drive our growth. Their tasks: identify needs, provide content and solutions, and build competitive services.

benefits.title: Back office
benefits.description: The engine of our company, which ensures smooth operation, guarantees satisfaction and supports our growth. It currently consists of the following departments:

jobs.title: How to become part of the team: our job openings
jobs.noJobs: We currently have no positions available
jobs.footerMessage: Don’t see a role that suits you?<break></break>Then persuade us that we absolutely have to get to know you anyway!<break><break>Send us your unsolicited application at <emailContact>people@supertext.com</emailContact>.

article_one.title: Our <highlight>diversity</highlight> makes us strong
article_one.description: We bring together countless cultures, languages, talents and interests in one place. This enriches our collaboration and makes us what we are: the all-in-one provider that can find a solution to every linguistic challenge. <break></break> <break></break> For us, a culture of mutual respect is just as important as fair pay and an open, flexible working environment. At Supertext, we organise ourselves independently, take responsibility and contribute ideas that actively shape our culture. Through training and ongoing feedback, we expand our knowledge and drive personal development.

footerNote.text: Are you a copywriter, translator, editor or SEO professional who would like to <highlightText>work with us as a freelancer?</highlightText>
footerNote.description: We are always looking for copywriters, translators, SEO specialists and editors to join our team of language professionals.

hero.title: Where language AI meets real expertise
hero.description: Our mission: to ensure maximum certainty in communication.

lead.large: AI tool or translation agency? We are both – and, <highlight>together, much more.</highlight>
lead.small: Supertext is an AI-based full-service language service provider with offices in Zurich and Berlin. Over 1,500 companies across Europe use our language solutions – from the adaptive online translator to the ISO-certified service for multilingual documents, websites, apps and multimedia campaigns.<break></break><break></break>Our team consists of over 100 specialists in the fields of artificial intelligence, linguistics, project management and security. They’re complemented by a selected network of 3,000 freelance language professionals around the world. <break></break><break></break>Together, we are developing a unique platform for copywriting and translation where companies can combine the advantages of AI and human language expertise to suit their needs. In this way, we are redefining communication: efficient, precise and maximally secure – from the content to the data protection.

items.title: 1 all-in-one solution for automatic and professional translations from a single source
1,500 clients from all industries and of all sizes
100+ in-house specialists in Zurich and Berlin
3,000 handpicked language professionals around the globe
113 target languages available
4 ISO certifications for data security (ISO 27001), quality management (ISO 9001) and translation quality (ISO 17001/18587)
20 years in business (since 2005)

locationsHeading.title: Locally anchored, globally present.

hero.title: AI translation with professional check
hero.description: Peace of mind – in minutes, not hours. Thanks to Verification by experienced translators at the push of a button.

lead.large: Your translation – professionally checked, when it really matters.
lead.small: AI translation is simple, fast and constantly improving. But there is one thing that only human experts can do, even in 2025: guarantee the accuracy of a translation. <break></break> <break></break> For important texts, Supertext connects you directly with over 3,000 experienced translators and cultural experts. With Verification at the push of a button, you can be certain that your message is being delivered correctly within just a few minutes. Reliable, affordable and fast.

informationalPanel.title: AI translation meets experienced professionals. What’s behind it?

items.title: State-of-the-art AI translation
items.description: The basis is our in-house translation systems. They belong to the latest generation of artificial intelligence and are proficient in 23 languages, including local language variants.

items.title: Professionally checked – in a few minutes
items.description: Our experts are all native speakers of your target language. They immediately ensure that the content of the translation corresponds exactly to the original – and also intervene linguistically where necessary.

items.title: Always improving: your personal AI model learns as it goes
items.description: As soon as the check is complete, we deliver the verified translation to you for download – and to your personal language model for ongoing improvement in real time.

tutorialBlock.title: Three steps to a professionally reviewed translation

items.title: Translate on supertext.com and choose “Start professional check”
Confirm project details and specify payment method
Collect your verified translation a few minutes later

featureGallery.title: Guaranteed quality from Å to Ž

items.title: 3,000 certified native language experts
items.description: All our specialist translators have a university degree in translation or at least five years of professional experience and must pass an internal test.

items.title: Tested, standardised and certified according to ISO
items.description: Supertext has been certified for translation quality (ISO 17100 and 18587), quality management (ISO 9001) and data security (ISO 27001) since 2018.

items.title: Uncompromising security
items.description: We always keep your data safe and secure thanks to the highest data management standards, robust encryption and the most secure servers. That’s why we are the partner of choice for banks, government agencies and insurers.

items.title: A personal AI model that learns in real time
items.description: Our language models learn quickly – and adapt to your needs with every verified translation. This ensures that the quality keeps rising and your costs keep falling in the long term.

hero.title: State-of-the-art, adaptive and maximally secure
hero.description: Supertext trains its AI individually on your corporate language. For demonstrably better translations in real time.

lead.small: Our LLM-based translation technology combines the latest research findings with maximum flexibility. The result: measurably better language quality at continuously decreasing costs. <break></break> <break></break> Whether as a basis for your professional translators, fully automatically via plugins and APIs, or as a freely accessible tool for your employees – we give your company a voice. In every language and every format.

row1.title: Our language AI: the flexible starting point
row1.description: Our large language models (LLMs) are specialised in translation and form the foundation of your individual translation tool. From here, we start a personalised training process.

row2.title: Specialised training – for better language quality throughout your company
row2.description: We set up your personal language models using your existing professional translations, terminology databases and style guides – and train them on your corporate language and tone of voice. The result: instant translations that are demonstrably better and more accurate.

row1.title: Always improving: your personal AI learns as it goes
row1.description: Your custom-built language models learn quickly – and adapt to your corporate language with every new professional translation. Always up-to-date, so that your entire company speaks with one voice.

row2.title: In-house expertise from the code to the interface
row2.description: Our AI research and development teams are doing pioneering work that pays off. Thanks to in-house development, we can implement new languages and features in record time. Flexible, reliable and system-agnostic in application.

tools.title: Translate accurately with our additional features

row1.title: Word alternatives
row1.description: Click on a particular word to see several synonyms and choose the most appropriate one.

row2.title: Rephrase
row2.description: Don’t like a passage? Just highlight several words and our system will automatically suggest variations.

row3.title: Formality
row3.description: Casual or polite? Switch easily between formal and informal forms of address depending on your target audience and style needs.

row1.title: Gender-inclusive language
row1.description: Our translation models can be made gender-neutral at the push of a button, if required. Currently available in German and English.

row2.title: Length restriction
row2.description: Space problems? With our character limit feature, you can shorten the translated text to the length of the original with a single click.

serviceList.title: Security is our favourite word in every language
serviceList.description: We always keep your data safe and secure thanks to the highest data management standards, robust encryption and highly protected Swiss servers That’s why we are the partner of choice for banks, authorities and insurers. And of course, 100% compliant with GDPR and the Swiss Data Protection Act.

sections.title: ISO-certified for data security and more
sections.description: Supertext is certified for data security (ISO 27001), quality management (ISO 9001) and translation quality (ISO 17100 and 18587).

sections.title: Encrypted data transmission
sections.description: All data is transmitted in encrypted form and can never be viewed by third parties.

sections.title: Translations are not stored
sections.description: With a subscription, you have the guarantee that your AI translations will not be stored or used to train our AI models.

sections.title: Single sign-on (SSO)
sections.description: Efficiently and centrally manage access to the translation system using your organisation’s existing user accounts.

sections.title: Private cloud or on-premises hosting
sections.description: With Supertext, you decide where your solution is hosted: on our servers, in the cloud of your choice or on your own hardware.

sections.title: Custom TLS/SSL certificates
sections.description: For full control over the encryption of your data and a seamless integration of Supertext AI translation into even more systems.

integrations.title: Fully compatible with your system environment
integrations.description: Only a seamless user experience gives a tool real added value. That’s why we continuously provide new plugins and a flexible RESTful API which lets you integrate Supertext into any working environment in just a few steps.

blog.title: Fingers on the pulse of research
blog.description: Many of our employees are an integral part of the global AI research community. We make an active contribution to machine learning research with regular publications.

footerNote.text: <highlightText>Experienced professionals</highlightText> – in top form thanks to language AI
footerNote.description: From computer linguists to language specialists: meet the team behind Supertext.

footerNote.title: Do you want to <highlightText> save resources and use AI translation as productively as possible</highlightText> in your company? Let’s talk.
